title: Latex Bee

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to sting a player, preventing them from using an ability the following night.
- Use 2 bees to reduce a player's willpower by 10%
- Use 3 bees to transfur another player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.

desc:
Post 2904
*"The studies have shown that Latexes made to resemble animals with coloration in mind tend to have a likeness towards said animals. Hence why we made this thing to keep track of the bees in the greenhouse." -Dr.█████, MIT.*
